item.title: I need help editing a client I leeched
item.dc:creator: @Killermax Killermax
item.description:
@Killermax wrote:

http://uppit.com/v/WK11MPEO

Could you change the stuff for me?

1)Change the set server ip to punks4life.no-ip.biz
2)Change the client name to punks4life.no-ip.biz
3)Change the website under gui.class to punks4life.darkbb.com
4)Pretty much change str3ngthscap3 under client.java and gui.java to punks4life

If you would do that , it would be greatly appreciated

item.title: I need help editing a client I leeched
item.dc:creator: @gelert gelert
item.description:
@gelert wrote:

[quote=“Killermax, post:1, topic:304269”]I downloaded a client and im trying to make it my own by changing something.

Here are the things im trying to change, if u could help that’d be great:

  1. The server login. It’s built in to login to str3ngthscap3.no-ip.biz. How do i change it to punks4life.no-ip.biz. I searched under client.class and changed it but it is still the same ip login

  2. How do I change the client name? Like when it opens it says Str3ngthscap3 client. How do i change it to mine?

Thanks[/quote]

To change the ip you must search in “client.java” for str3ngthscap3.no-ip.biz, and change it to yours, and if you can find it, search for str3ngthscap3.no-ip.biz in “gui.java” or “egui.java” and change it to your server ip

  1. Look for Str3ngthscap3 in “gui” or “egui” note: it will normaly be at the bottem of the file

Read full topic
